author: trawick
msg: tidy up some charset recoding issues
the "need" for APACHE_XLATE went away some years ago when BUFF went
POOF and charset recoding (translation) of non-protocol data
could no longer be performed by the core...

author: gozer
msg: Fix Apache::TestConfigParse to handle glob includes, like Include

author: nd
msg: next issue with mod_include backport resolved

author: rederpj
msg: *) mod_expires: Initialize ExpiresDefault to NULL instead of "" to
avoid reporting an Internal Server error if it is used without
having been set in the httpd.conf file. PR: 23748, 24459
Reviewed by: Andre Malo and Jeff Trawick.
